roleset.name: ask a favor, ask a request, ask for

roles.note: Actually two slightly different senses of 'request', but taking the same PAS.

example.name: no hearer
example.text: Timex had requested duty-free treatment for many types of watches, covered by 58 different U.S. tariff classifications.
example.arg: duty-free treatment for many types of watches, covered by 58 different U.S. tariff classifications

example.name: with hearer/granter, and stupid broken arg
example.text: Emerson Electric Co. and Robert Bosch G.m.b.H. said the Federal Trade Commission has requested additional information from the two companies about their announced intention to acquire Vermont American Corp. for $40 a share, or about $440 million.
example.arg: about their announced intention to acquire Vermont American Corp. for $40 a share, or about $440 million
